title: Sounds become distorted when playing league.
body:
Hello,

The past 2 days everytime get into a game of league all the other sounds on my computer become extremely distorted, whether it's from a youtube video, or from a facebook notification it's all the same. My in game sounds are absolutely fine but everything else turns to shit.

Anyone know how to fix?

replies.body:
Hey there,

Sounds to me like league may be utilising enough system resources to effectively "slow down" any other applications running on your system.
Do you notice this "distortion" while running any other resource intensive applications (Games, etc)?
Hmm, I notice it a bit when Discord is booting up. But apart from that it seems to be fine, I was running AoE 2 the other night and everything was fine.

From a quick google search, AoE2 is less resource intensive than league.

Could you provide your system specs please.
Seems like since the latest League update it is fine. Thanks for all your help.

From Speccy:

Operating System
	Windows 10 Home 64-bit
CPU
	Intel Core i7 2600 @ 3.40GHz	
	Sandy Bridge 32nm Technology
RAM
	16.0GB Dual-Channel DDR3 @ 665MHz (9-9-9-24)
Motherboard
	Gigabyte Technology Co. Ltd. H67MA-USB3-B3 (Socket 1155)	
Graphics
	Philips 244EL (1920x1080@60Hz)
	SDM-S93 (1280x1024@60Hz)
	2048MB ATI AMD Radeon R7 360 Series (Gigabyte)	
Storage
	1863GB Western Digital WDC WD20EARX-00PASB0 (SATA)	
Optical Drives
	HL-DT-ST BDDVDRW CH12LS28
Audio
	Logitech G430 Gaming Headset
Try updating your graphics and sound drivers and see if that fixes the issue.
Hi! I probably should have added this to my main post, all my drivers are up to do date :).

Hmmm..if it was League sounds being distorted I might have an idea but, really not sure with this one. I'll pass it onto the Wrenchmen and see if they can't work it out, but I'd probably submit a ticket to player support for this one. Might take a day or two to get it resolved but they know far more about these rare cases than we do.

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new
